entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 02:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
